title: Super Mothership - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Ecchi   Harem   Mecha   Sci-fi   Shounen   Supernatural
tags: Aliens   Artificial Intelligence   Assassins   Beastkin   Demi-Humans   Earth Invasion   Elves   Industrialization   Interconnected Storylines   Knights   Male Protagonist   Outer Space   Overpowered Protagonist   Poor Protagonist   Poor to Rich   Romantic Subplot   Weak to Strong
author: Empty Evergreen
description:
Nie Yun, a young fisherman, accidentally merged with high-level civilization mechanical insects, opening the path of magnificent transformation from a small fishing boat to a super mothership!

Nie Yun: “As far as we can see, there are fishing grounds! Let’s start to conquer the sea of ​​Star!”>
